scriptResume

I wrote this package to make peace with my own laziness. My routine scripting work requires frequent documentation process. This R addin package was born to facilitate coding experience. And of course, all the default parameters are set to fit my own need. ðŸ¤ª To achieve the best user experience, I use these addin functions with keyboard binding short cuts in VScode or other IDEs that allow user defined keyboard shortcuts.

Iâ€™m not sure how relevant this package can be outside of my current workplace setting. As I get lazier, I will add more addin functions and of course, the existing functions will be tailed to my future needs. ðŸ™‰
